content:
Craft an item of type: iron_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "dragon_breath", "quantity": 24, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: I need to craft an iron_shovel, which requires an iron_ingot and a stick. An iron_ingot can be crafted from an iron_block, so I will first move the iron_block from slot 25 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "dragon_breath", "quantity": 24, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: After crafting the iron_ingot, I need to move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

Craft an item of type: iron_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "dragon_breath", "quantity": 24, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]

thought: In order to craft an iron shovel, I need to craft a stick. A stick can be crafted from dark oak planks, which are currently stored at slot 15. Therefore, I will move the dark oak planks to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "dragon_breath", "quantity": 24, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: To craft the stick, I also need birch planks, which are stored at slot 16. Therefore, I will move the birch planks to slot 4, which is adjacent to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "dragon_breath", "quantity": 24, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: I have now successfully crafted the stick. The stick is in slot 0, so I will move it to an empty slot in my inventory (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: iron_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "dragon_breath", "quantity": 24, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: To craft an iron shovel I need to place 1 iron ingot in slot 1 and 2 sticks in slot 5 and 8. Therefore I will move the iron ingot from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "dragon_breath", "quantity": 24, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: Since the iron ingot has been placed in slot 1, I now need to place a stick in slot 5. Therefore I will move the stick from slot 12 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "dragon_breath", "quantity": 24, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: Now I have placed the stick in slot 5, I need to place another stick in slot 8. Therefore I will move the stick from slot 12 to slot 7.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 7 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "iron_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "dragon_breath", "quantity": 24, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: Now I can craft the iron shovel by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 1
